name: Witchess
description:
WITCHESS

Witchess is a third-person, puzzle-strategy game where a young witch embarks on a journey to rescue her cat, Poly. You must use her four elemental spells to navigate through chess board levels littered with enemies and obstacles.

Once you clear the main story (a rather short campaign), there are three bonus levels ("kaizo levels") with greater difficulty found in level select.

Creation:

Witchess was created by a small student team in the span of a month and a half. The initial project was actually inspired by Smash Bros, though we took the approach of "finding the fun" and letting the game "design itself." We're amused to see how differently it turned out!

Credits:

In addition to the people listed here, the creation of our game was also made possible by wonderful strangers on the internet who uploaded their assets for free use. To see the full list, see the CREDITS.txt which comes with the game. (The background image of the page is also credited here.)
